---
name: Bug Report
about: Use this template to report a bug
title: ''
labels: kind/bug
assignees: ''

---

### Detailed description

A clear and concise description of what the problem is. Please include logs, screenshots or whatever other information to reproduce the error.

### Expected behaviour

Expected behaviour once the problem is fixed.


### Technical Solution

If at bug creation time is no information on how to solve, leave blank until bug inspection and triage.
_Si en el momento de la creación del fallo no hay información sobre cómo resolverlo, déjalo en blanco hasta el triage e inspección del fallo._

Technical detail of what would need to be done or what would need to be modified to implement the bugfix. Enough detail should be given so that there is no doubt as to how to start and finish the task. Diagrams or any other graphical means of help, links, documentation, source code examples, etc... can be included.

_Detalle técnico de qué habría que hacer o qué habría que modificar para implementar el bugfix. Se debe dar un detalle suficiente para que no haya dudas de como empezar y terminar la tarea. Se pueden incluir diagramas o cualquer otro medio gráfico de ayuda, enlaces, documentación, ejemplos de código fuente, etc..._

### Acceptance criteria

- [ ] Bug is fixed
- [ ] Test are implemented covering bugfix code
- [ ] acceptance criteria 1
- [ ] acceptance criteria 2
- [ ] acceptance criteria n
